jobDescription: Representing a large financial institution in San Francisco who is seeking a Business Analyst to be the go between to relay what the technical team can provide to enhance customer experience. Requires 2-5 years previous business analyst experience within financial services; comfortable speaking with developers and business bankers. Strong Excel and Visio experience is a must. Great innovative team environment with opportunities for growth in multiple areas. This is a 12 month assignment with the potential to hire. Please send resume to leah.eiselman@rhmr.com for further information and consideration.
